Package org.pepstock.charba.client

Interface MutationHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractChart, AreaChart, BarChart, BaseGeoChart, BaseMeterChart, BubbleChart, BubbleMapChart, ChoroplethChart, DoughnutChart, GaugeChart, HorizontalBarChart, LineChart, MatrixChart, MeterChart, PieChart, PolarAreaChart, RadarChart, SankeyChart, ScatterChart, StackedAreaChart, StackedBarChart, StackedHorizontalBarChart, StackedLineChart, StackedVerticalLineChart, TimeSeriesBarChart, TimeSeriesLineChart, TreeMapChart, VerticalLineChart
    interface MutationHandler
    Defines the methods needed to manage the attach and detach of the chart in the and from the DOM tree.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getId()
      Returns the ID of chart.
      It could be considered as chart unique ID.
      void onAttach​(MutationItem item)
      Invoked by mutation observer when a chart has been attached in the DOM tree.
      void onDetach​(MutationItem item)
      Invoked by mutation observer when a chart has been detached from the DOM tree.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()
        Returns the ID of chart.
        It could be considered as chart unique ID.
        Returns:
        the ID of chart

      • onAttach

        void onAttach​(MutationItem item)
        Invoked by mutation observer when a chart has been attached in the DOM tree.
        Parameters:
        item - can not be instantiated out of this package to avoid that anyone (apart the observer) will invoke the method.

      • onDetach

        void onDetach​(MutationItem item)
        Invoked by mutation observer when a chart has been detached from the DOM tree.
        Parameters:
        item - can not be instantiated out of this package to avoid that anyone (apart the observer) will invoke the method.
